H0.text: Which footballer, with 77 goals, has scored the most goals in internationals for Brazil. Ronaldo

H1.text: Which footballer, with 77 goals, has scored the most goals in internationals for Brazil. Romário

H2.text: Which footballer, with 77 goals, has scored the most goals in internationals for Brazil. Zico

H3.text: Which footballer, with 77 goals, has scored the most goals in internationals for Brazil. Péle

A4.text: With 77 goals in 92 games for Brazil, Pelé held the record as the national team's top goalscorer for over fifty years until it was surpassed by Neymar (in his 125th game) in September 2023.

A5.text: Pelé's 77 goals (in 92 games) for Brazil saw him hold the record as the national team's top goalscorer for over fifty years until it was surpassed by Neymar (in his 125th game) in September 2023.
